TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 在序列化時，向 XAML 處理器表示應該修剪標記中類型項目周圍的空白。

span.span: Indicates to XAML processors that the whitespace surrounding elements of the type in markup should be trimmed when serializing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會套用至特定的類型，可能會顯示為空白字元重要內容中的子項目。This attribute is applied to specific types that might appear as child elements within whitespace significant content. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 中的空白字元處理](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md). 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
